website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, vibrantly colored, and a fun callback to Goku’s earliest adventures, you can always count on Funko to deliver a quality POP! toy.
pros: Young Goku riding the Flying Nimbus, redesigned in the iconic Funko Pop style
Nimbus functions as a figure stand

customer_reviews.title: Awwesome Young Goku Figure
customer_reviews.text: One of the better Funko Pop figures I've had. The paint job is clean and the mold is nice. The Dragon Ball meets Funko Pop style looks great and growing up with Dragon Ball I appreciate a young Goku figure with his original gi, staff, and nimbus cloud. If you're a young Goku fan or you know one, this is a great figure to get at a good price ~$10 and I can more than easily recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: I Like StuffTop Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: For the collectors: The box was pristine. Probably one of the best I've ever got. Paint was perfect. Lines tight and colors bright. Not sure it would look good displayed in the box because there is so much detail on the back. For the rest of us: This thing is heavy! It feels like it weighs almost as much as my 6 inch Alduin. Goku's weapon and tail seem pretty secure. The weight of Nimbus make this little guy pretty sturdy, but for Kai's sake, do not drop it on your foot. Not a pleasant experience...
customer_reviews.author: FrancisTop Contributor: Dragon Ball Z (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: Well Painted Figure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this figure for my friend’s birthday, so I really hoped that it would come with a good paint job and in overall good condition. I wasn’t disappointed. I think she will be really happy with this goku figure, the hair has very few flaws and the clothing has few paint errors as well. It’s sculpted very unique and well. The box didn’t come damaged as well. I recommend buying this figure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great figure
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the figure itself having any defects like a few reviews I've seen. The box was in good condition, but is now in the trash because I like opening and using what I buy. Same quality as other Funko Pop figures and was cheaper than in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Xem

customer_reviews.title: Ok cool. Well this one came perfect
customer_reviews.text: Apparently can't write a review based on the product I got from which seller. Ok cool. Well this one came perfect. But from the same seller I received a banged up pop. Maybe this one can be posted. If the box is important I would be careful ordering online.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P

customer_reviews.title: KINTA UN
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how you spell it since it's actually in Japanese lol but love this kid Goku with Nimbus. Perfect bday gift for my husband. Sturdy and as pictured :)
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box, but figure is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the box being snagged on the Goku on the front, I am a collector of sorts. I think it wouldn’t be too bad for gifting someone, if they aren’t huge into having a perfect box. The figure i’m very satisfied with, it is flat on the bottom so no need to worry about balance issues on a shelf! I think any Dragon Ball fan would love this!
customer_reviews.author: Merob

customer_reviews.title: Goku Diaper cake
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for my dragon ball z theme diaper cake. Good quality and great size
customer_reviews.author: Nina Bacchus

customer_reviews.title: Nimbus Cloud Detail is extraordinary!
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this FUNKO, besides it being dragon ball z, is the detail and attention to GOKUS NIMBUS CLOUD! I will leave several different pics both in the case and outside in an attempt to demonstrate the versatility of display potential
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Its a nicely put together pop
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality pop. was concerned with the paint going from cloud to feet, but pulled off very well. Its got nice weight to it so it wont fall over. Came wrapped in bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Right product but damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Got the item on scheduled delivery date however the box was slightly damaged probably due to Shipping and Handling. Considering the item is a collectible this brings the value of the item down a bit. I would suggest offering as an option to have the item come with a protector even at an extra cost just to protect it from damage. But overall Happy With the product
customer_reviews.author: jr ofilada

customer_reviews.title: Squad Goals!
customer_reviews.text: I had pre-ordered this Goku a few months ago so I forgot all about it until it surprised my by appear in my mailbox! What a neat gift to myself! As someone who grew up with DBZ it's really cool to see Goku hanging out on my desk every day. Its construction is really solid, colors are vibrant and true, and it has a good weight to it as all Funko POP products go. Definitely a good addition to any DBZ fan's collection!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Item for desk
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my husband and he loves it. He puts this on display on his desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jennylyn Ork

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Figure, Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Goku Funko Pop figure for my boyfriend as a birthday gift & I think he will love it! He is a big Dragon Ball fan and he only has one pop figure so far so I figured I'd help him expand his collection by getting him this Goku Funko Pop.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: If you like Dragonball, this is for you
customer_reviews.text: The paint job on Goku's face, especially the eyes, isn't that great. I would have only gave 3 stars but Dragonball is one of the best animes and Goku is such an iconic character that I couldn't undermine the pop for such a small reason

product_meta.title: Funko POP Anime: Dragonball Z - Goku & Nimbus Action Figure
feature_bullets: From Dragonball, Goku, as a Stylized POP Vinyl from Funko
Stylized Collectable Stands 3 3/4 inches tall on Top of the Nimbus Cloud, Perfect for any Dragonball fan
Collect and Display all Dragonball Pop Vinyl's
